mmcq.resources: There are no resources in this topic.
mmcq.transcript: There is no transcript in this activity.
mmcq.questionText: An insurance company is preparing an Employee Benefits proposal for a large Multi-national firm. A representative of the Broker contacted the Sales Executive, seeking a proposal. The Sales Executive will present the solution to the Broker handling the account. The intermediary, who has been a long-time consultant to the client, will take the solution to the client only if they approve of it.
mmcq.instructionText: Select the correct option and click Submit

options.option: Send to Underwriting anyway without a further explanation; they can work it out.
Decide yourself what the job descriptions your self what the job descriptions your self what the job descriptions .
Send to Underwriting anyway without a further explanation; they can work it
Ask the intermediary for further clarification.

feedbacks.feedback: Get the correct information from the intermediary before sending the RFP to Underwriting. Never assume anything or forward incomplete information.
Partal Feedback Never assume anything or forward incomplete information. Never assume anything or forward incomplete information.
Incorrect Feedback Never assume anything or forward incomplete information. Never assume anything or forward incomplete information.
Get the correct information from the intermediary before sending the RFP to Underwriting. Never assume anything or forward incomplete information.
